original_text: Jacob was in love with Rachel and said, “I’ll work for you seven years in return for your younger daughter Rachel.”
korean_text: 야곱이 라헬을 더 사랑하므로 대답하되 내가 외삼촌의 작은 딸 라헬을 위하여 외삼촌에게 칠 년을 섬기리이다

sentences.original_text: Jacob was in love with Rachel
I'll work for you seven years
in return for your younger daughter Rachel
